Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Passed the international quality management system certificationLatest facilities1000+ well-trained skilled workers

Reliable Warehouse

With safe and efficient management system, every unit will be delivered to your hands in well-package and promptly.

UPGRADED AIR VENT HOOK: This car vent phone holder mount is designed as “Hook shape” and form “Three grasp points” which can firmly hook around the a/c vent for no slippage or movement. It solving the market’s common problem of falling forward and off the air vent constantly when going over bumps or turns. NOTE: THE LENGTH OF CLAMP BETWEEN 0.41-0.98IN. THIS PHONE HOLDER ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH HORITABLE AIR VENT.
AUTO LOCK, NO MORE FALL :This gravity slide-in car phone holder creatively features the Auto-lock arm-slots that stretch on the side can auto adjust to hold phone more firmly without fears of bumps. Compared to manual lock version which being loose frequently, as its automatic rebound design you no need for secondary adjustment. Special curve of arms fit phone better. The phone was all-round protected by silicone rubber on the inside clamps. NOTE:MAXIMUM THICKNESS OF DEVICE IS 14MM (0.5IN).
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: This universal car cell phone holder will firmly hold all the smart phones (4-7in) even with thicker case (‚â§14mm) compatible with iPhone 13 12 pro max/ 11 pro max/XR/X/8/7/6/5, Note 20 10/ Galaxy S10+/ S9/ S8 /S7 /S6 and more. NOTE:WE RECOMMEND USING THE SMALLER PHONE(Ôºú4.7inch) WITH PHONE CASE
NO BLOCK VENT & SAFER DRIVING: This car vent phone mount with folding back structure is very neat and keep it small when not in use, only 1/2 card size and 3 inches away from the vent to still allow air flow. You can have a wider sight and adjust this gravity car phone holder up/down or left/right. NOTE: THE HORIZONTAL MODE IS NOT SUPPORTED.

Unique Gravity Design – The Easiest Operation

Eliminate the trouble operation of pressing button. You just slide in and the car phone holder mount will clamp the phone automatically by gravity.

BIG PHONE & THICK CASE FRIENDLY

This car phone holder mount which can fit the phone with thicker case within 0.5inch/14mm. It is perfect fit for all devices from 4 to 7 inches.

  • Compatible with iPhone 13 12 11 Pro Max XR XS Max X 8 Plus 7 6s Plus, Samsung Galaxy s20 ultra 5G note 20 Ultra 10 plus 9 plus s10 s9 a10e, Google Nexus 6P / 6, Google Pixel 3 XL, LG, Sony, HTC, Motorola, and more.
  • Compatible with Crystal case cover; Liquid silicone case; Bumper case; Otterbox defender (without the belt-clip holster)

Note: The wallet case does not suit it.

Ultra Stable Hook Design

This car phone holder mount is designed as “hook shape” which can vise the outlet blades tightly and firmly.

The length of the clamp between 10.5mm – 25 mm (0.41in 0.98in)

USING TIPS

  1. IT IS RECOMMENDED USE FOR THE HORIZONTAL VENT
  2. First, please mount the air vent clip the vent, and make sure that the clip are screwed. Then, just put your phone into the gravity phone holder, and it can be locked automatically. Last, just take out your phone when you want to release.
  3. This holder maximum support 0.4-1 inch long of blades, 0.1 inch thick of blades.
  4. It is recommend that re-tighten the air vent clip once two week to ensure it keep stable.

4.5

From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

„ÄêPhone’s Safe Like in an Infant Seat„ÄëThis car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
„Äê0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operation„Äë andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
„Äê360¬∞ Flexible Rotation as Wish„Äë Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360¬∞ swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
„ÄêWide Compatible with All Smartphones„Äë This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
„ÄêAndobil Car Phone Holder Service„Äë Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

setInitialStates(

The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple¬Æ devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can‚Äôt live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it‚Äôs within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile‚Äôs most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it‚Äôs on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can‚Äôt find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.

DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.

IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. 5,000mAh Super Battery
